mapper.insert: insert into notice (bno, title, content, show_yn, writer, register_date) values (seq_notice.nextval , #{title}, #{content}, #{showYn}, #{writer}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, show_yn, writer, register_date from notice where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, where bno = #{bno}
